Text: There's nothing on IMDb so here's the movies homepage if your after a review or synopsis: http://www.kickoffthemovie.co.uk/

Proper DVDRip and a fast download...
A/10
V/10
Excellent Brit Indie comedy movie and Funny as f**k, but if your homophobic then stay away...
If your not sure whether you'll like the movie just check out the avi sample because the rest of the movie is just as camp...
Many Thanx to TvTeam and UNVEiL for the Great rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)

Be warned, entities using the name AXXO in their web address and screenname here on TPB are trying to get people to go to websites that claim to host "direct download" movies, movie posters, subtitles, IMDB links, etc.  Going to these sites at the very least will attempt to install malware and at the worst will add your ip address to a scary database....HA! he actually beat me here!  Go away "Axxodude" you fool almost no one!
